page.shortlink: api client api a5 d bool namespace

property.name: truthy
property.description: The string values that are considered to be true. Such as "yes", "y" or "1".

property.name: falsy
property.description: The string values that are considered to be false. Such as "no", "n" or "0".

page.note: Any properties in this namespace can be replaced or extended in order to support other languages or formats.
